document.full_text: residents of a quiet pakistani village were bemused on sunday to find themselves at the center of the investigation of the secret life of osama bin laden, saying there was no way that the al qaeda leader lived there without them knowing.
document.title: pakistani villagers bemused by hunt for bin laden's trail
lines_and_colors: residents of a quiet pakistani village were bemused on sunday to find themselves at the center of the investigation of the secret life of osama bin laden, saying there was no way that the al qaeda leader lived there without them knowing.
